name: Exorcism At DusckRidge Manor
description:
Exorcism At DusckRidge Manor is a 2 player Horror Co-op game. The Investigator must search around the house and find evidence to banish the ghost. The ghost must haunt the Investigator while also activating Pentagrams for increasing power. If the Investigator finds all the evidence and activates the Altar, the Investigator wins and if the Ghost drives the Investigator insane, Ghost wins. This project was showcased at LevelUp 2019 and received great response from visitors regarding the overall game design, art style and polish.

My role on the project was Lead Programmer.

My Contributions:

  1.  Investigator Behaviours
  2.  Ghost Behaviours
  3. Animation Controllers for Investigator and Ghost
  4. Interaction between Investigator and Ghost
  5. Interactive Items with Outline Shader for highlighting
  6. Interactive Objects such as Stairs, Doors, Pentagrams and Fireplaces
  7. Importing controller actions
  8. Haptic Feedback
